Message:
That plant always bears
flowers in the winter.

Since the flowers bloom
quietly amidst the snow,
it seldom catches the eyes
of passersby.

“If a flower’s worth lies
in people’s admiration of it,

then does it mean that
white flower is without
any worth...?”

“‘Worth’ is merely a label—
an afterthought that people
give out only to suit themselves,”
he explained.

“A flower blooms whether
it’s admired or not.

It chooses where to take
root and when to bloom.
Those choices make the flower.”

“That’s why it’s okay for
you to do the same, Shizu.
No matter which choices
you make, you will
always be you.”

He told me that I needn’t
seek from others a reason
nor right to exist...

Such a thought had never
once crossed my mind before...
